common.countdown_title_label: Your session is about to expire
common.countdown_description_label: For your security, you will be logged out by the system in

offline.title: Sorry, the system encountered a problem
offline.message: You seem to be offline. Check your internet connection and try again.

general_error.title: Sorry, the system encountered a problem

errors.empty_file_error: You must upload a valid document.
errors.empty_upload_error: You must upload all documents to proceed.
errors.network_error: Your document failed to upload as there was a network error.
errors.submission_error: Your declaration failed to submit as there was a network error.
errors.invalid_file_type_error: You must upload a document in an acceptable file format.
errors.limit_file_size_error: Your document failed to upload as the file size exceeded 2MB.
errors.limit_file_size_5MB_error: Your document failed to upload as the file size exceeded 5MB.
errors.duplicate_file_error: Your document failed to upload as another document has the same name.
errors.pdf_error: Your document failed to upload as the file is corrupted.
errors.pdf_encrypted_error: Your document failed to upload as the file is password protected.
errors.invalid_file_error: You must upload a valid document.
errors.invalid_file_name_special_char_error: Your document failed to upload as the file name contains special characters, such as ‘;:></\*%$&’.
errors.invalid_file_name_length_error: You must upload a file with a name that does not exceed 100 characters.

error.try_other_card: Your payment request could not be processed. Please try with another card.
error.invalid_card_type: You must enter a valid Visa, Mastercard or Amex card number.
error.invalid_card: Please check your card details and try again.
error.retry_30_min: Your payment request could not be processed. Please try again in 30 minutes.
error.not_3ds_supported: Your payment request could not be processed. Please use another payment method or try again in 15 minutes.
error.invalid_cvv: Transaction declined: invalid CVV number. Please try again with the correct CVV number or use a different payment method.
error.checkout_fail: Something went wrong. Payment could not be made. Please retrieve your draft and try again after 30 minutes.

declaration.ea: I declare that I have obtained written authorisation from the employer and/or foreigner to perform this transaction, and that the employer and/or foreigner has/have consented in writing to pre-fill and display their data (including personal data) in this form.

links.mom_information_instruction: For more information, please visit MOM website

input.notification_message: We will notify you of the _ outcome or if we need more documents. The email address you provide must belong to a user authorised to transact for your organisation.
input.notification_message_withdrawal_form: We will send you notifications relating to this transaction through email. The email address you provide must belong to a user authorised to transact for your organisation.

uam.notification_message: Updating this email address will affect notifications sent for all transactions.
uam.notification_label: We will send all notifications to

modal.title: You are about to update your email
modal.body_1: You will be redirected from this page. This form has been saved and you may retrieve it from
modal.body_2: after updating and verifying your email.
modal.body_no_draft: You will be redirected from this page and your information will be lost. Do you wish to continue?
modal.body_short: You will be redirected from this page.

updated_email_modal.title: You have updated your email
updated_email_modal.body_1: We will send all notifications to
updated_email_modal.body_2: Please review the details before submitting this transaction.
